posting_body: ['show contact info', 'No credit check is required.', 'No application fee.', 'No lease.', ' "MUST PASS BACKGROUND CHECK"', "WE ARE LOCATED ON THE CORNER OF INDIOS AND BOULDER HWY, ACROSS WELLS FARGO AND SINCLAIR'S GAS STATION.", 'Whether you are a family relocating to a new city, a business traveler, vacationer, or just making a new start here in Las Vegas we can be your living solution.', 'Our apartments are spacious, comfortable and equally affordable.', 'Our property is designed to serve you with many amenities including:', 'Fully Furnished Apartments', 'All Utilities Paid', 'Cox Cable TV', 'Full Size Kitchens', 'Full Size Appliances', 'On-Site Laundry Facilities', 'Beautiful Pools and Spas (seasonal)', 'Onsite Maintenance', 'Onsite Property Management', 'Plenty of Parking', 'Courtesy Patrol', 'AY']
